headline.main: TROOPS IN AFRICA USE BOAT-TRUCKS; Amphibious Vehicles Employed for Training Can Brave 10-Foot Waves Safely

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 31 (AP) -- Large numbers of big landing boats and power barges are on hand in North Africa, two Army generals reported today and troops there are being trained in the use of a new amphibious truck.
snippet: WASHINGTON, May 31 (AP) -- Large numbers of big landing boats and power barges are on hand in North Africa, two Army generals reported today and troops there are being trained in the use of a new amphibious truck....
